member.summary: Evaluates whether a command line parameter exists
member.param: The string[] that contains all command line parameters.
The cmd line param that what searched for
member.returns: true if it Exists, false if it doesnt exists

member.name: M:MorseCraft.Program.GetSubCmdParam(System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Gets the sub commandline parameter like a path or something. example: -text "hello world" would return hello world.
member.param: the param where we would like to get the sub param
member.returns: the sub param or string.empty if it not exists
